snippet: Many investors remain uncertain as the stimulus program nears an end and the Federal Reserve considers raising interest rates.
abstract: Stocks edge lower as investors await news on outlook for Federal Reserve's interest rate policy.
lead_paragraph: Many investors remain uncertain as the stimulus program nears an end and the Federal Reserve considers raising interest rates.

headline.main: Shares Slip as Investors Await News From Fed About Rates
headline.print_headline: Shares Slip as Investors Await News From Fed About Rates
